column1: neuoe dipabi tsaka tsee kenengkeditsetse ka moo di kae
kerwakile ngwana wahao mme wa tsebo
leo ulekutlutseng neuoe nkadime kwano kebone
ake unkadime lejwe leo nke ketloukutlulela
ache mme mamello oafapana le wena
uitse ha epshatlehile etlaba ya rona
neuoe tsamaya uilobolela mme lineo o ka dipaleseng
ke nna enwa ka mahlong a neuoe
ke nna enwa ka mahlong ahao
di ngata dintho tsena tsa batho bana
nka uilobeha ifo mane pela tsenethu
he wena mphe lejwe leno lee le pela pampiri
e tsamaya uilompha lane le pela pampiri hape
ekeneng sekolong ke efeng bana beso
